mapper.select: select p.p_code,f.fo_code,p.p_date, p.p_sum, p.p_ck,p.p_ck_date, o.s_id, d.deli_type, o.o_code, o.o_date from pay p, orderinfo o, final_order f, deli d where o.s_id =#{s_id} and o.o_code=f.o_code and f.fo_code=p.fo_code and d.deli_code=f.deli_code

select c.can_code, c.can_date, c.can_why, o.s_id, f.fo_code from cancel_test c, orderinfo o, final_order f, pay p where o.s_id=#{s_id} and o.o_code=f.o_code and f.fo_code=p.fo_code and p.p_code=c.p_code

select r.rt_code, r.p_code, r.rt_date, r.rt_why,o.s_id, o.o_code from return_test r, orderinfo o, final_order f, pay p where o.s_id=#{s_id} and o.o_code=f.o_code and f.fo_code=p.fo_code and p.p_code=r.p_code

select d.deli_type, fo.fo_code, cs.cates_name, cm.catemm_name, fo.deli_code, fo.fo_date, fo.fo_sum, fo.fo_num, fo.fo_size, fo.fo_etc from final_order fo, deli d,cate_sub cs, cate_mid cm where fo_code = #{fo_code} and fo.cates_code = cs.cates_code and cs.catemm_code = cm.catemm_code and fo.deli_code = d.deli_code

select fo.fo_code, p.p_code, d.d_name, d.d_tel, d.d_addr, d.d_memo, d.d_date, d.d_state from final_order fo, delivery d, pay p where fo.fo_code = #{fo_code} and fo.fo_code = p.fo_code and p.p_code = d.p_code
